name: Diegozeng's Home Page
body:
## **Background**

***
* [University of Macau](http://www.umac.mo/) (2010-2014),   Bachelor of Science,   Electrical and Electronic Engineering

***
## **Experience**

***
* [INESC Macau](http://www.inesc.pt/files/pages/inesc.php), Research Assistant
* [IST Austria](https://ist.ac.at/), Visiting Scientist 
* [New Oriental Education & Technology Group](http://english.neworiental.org/publish/portal59/), Teacher Assistant

***
## **Research**
1. Bio-signal processing and analysis 
   * [ECG feature points detection](https://github.com/diegozeng/ECG-analysis-and-identification)
   * PCG (Heart sound signal) denoising
   * [Hippocampal Sharp Wave Ripple (SWR) detection on CA1/CA3 region](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0hucuaul57ud8n5/Poster%EF%BC%88A0%EF%BC%89.pdf)
2. Applications on Embedded system / Microprocessor / DSP / FPGA   
   * 8051 series (AT89C52/C8051F340)
   * AVR (ATmega328) [Arduino Uno](http://arduino.cc/en/Main/arduinoBoardUno)
   * ARM (SAM3X8E) [Arduino Due](http://arduino.cc/en/Main/arduinoBoardDue)
3. Data Science 
   * Machine learning
   * ARIMA/State-Space Models 
   * Data Mining

***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
